forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Partly cloudy. Low around 60, with temperatures rising to around 62 overnight. East southeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 82. Southeast wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 65, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 2pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 81. North wind 3 to 9 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
